DESCRIPTION: Removes spaces from the end of a string.
EXAMPLE: <h3>RTrim Example</h3> <cfif IsDefined("FORM.myText")> <cfoutput> <pre> Your string: "#FORM.myText#" Your string: "#RTrim(FORM.myText)#" (right trimmed) </pre> </cfoutput> </cfif> <form action = "Rtrim.cfm" method="post"> <p>Enter some text. It will be modified by Rtrim to remove spaces from the right. <p><input type = "Text" name = "myText" value = "TEST "> <p><input type = "Submit" name = ""> </form>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: A string or a variable that contains one
